headline: Learn From Warren Buffett's Mistake. Buy This High-Yield Stock While It Is Out of Favor on Wall Street.
summary: Warren Buffett is a major shareholder in Kraft Heinz.  Buffett has described his purchase of Kraft Heinz as a mistake.  There's an attractive opportunity for investors to avoid the kind of mistake Buffett made with Kraft Heinz, and it's available right now.
